1.name: MT900
1.description: MT900/910 is generated and sent by GPP to the Dr/Cr party.

3.name: Pacs.002
3.description: Pacs.002 is generated and sent by GPP back to the sender bank/Feeder.

5.name: Pain.002
5.description: Status feedback to the feeder system is sent in the format of Pain.002 embedded in FndtMsg with the status as ACSC

6.name: Pain.002
6.description: Status feedback to the feeder system is sent in the format of Pain.002 embedded in FndtMsg with the status as RJCT, with reason code as defined in GPP

7.name: Pain.002
7.description: Status feedback to the feeder system is sent in the format of Pain.002 embedded in FndtMsg with the status as RJCT, with reason code as was entered by the user

9.name: Camt.054 Debit Notification
9.description: Camt.054 Debit Notification is sent. (reverse the debit)

10.name: Camt.054 Credit Notification
10.description: Camt.054 Credit Notification will be sent only for Account Types that do not belong to the bank, e.g. account types CUST, CAFC.
